Book Title: Aarav’s Big Feelings: A Story About Handling Emotions
Story Premise: Aarav navigates friendship fights, jealousy, teasing, and fear of failure—all while preparing for a big school play
Cultural Setting: Modern Indian school and home life
Opening Scene Idea: Aarav is excited to be play narrator, until he hears Anaya got a bigger role
Notes: Inspired by Permission to Feel and Emotional Agility. Combine multiple emotional moments into one narrative arc.
